DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 , open-label , 3-arm trial two Sym004 dos ( Arms A B ) control group ( Arm C ) subject metastatic colorectal cancer ( mCRC ) acquire resistance anti-epidermal growth factor receptor ( EGFR ) monoclonal antibody ( mAbs ) .
DOC.brief_title: Sym004 vs Standard Care Subjects With Metastatic Colorectal Cancer
